steps.title: What are you experiencing?
steps.subtitle: Take a moment to notice what's happening in your body, mind, and urges.

steps.title: Explore the Emotions Wheel
steps.subtitle: Explore the wheel, then click to select what you think you are feeling after exploring.

steps.title: Check Your Match
steps.subtitle: Compare your initial guess with your selected emotion.

steps.title: What is this emotion telling you?
steps.subtitle: Emotions are messengers. What might yours be trying to communicate?
